existing_features.title: Create a dedicated "Images" (gallery) section in the app UI that displays the 8 uploaded images in a responsive grid layout with consistent spacing, rounded corners, and proper aspect-ratio handling (no layout shifts while loading).

Add navigation so users can reach the new Images/Gallery section from the existing app structure (without removing any current sections), using a consistent navigation pattern already present in the app.
Enable viewing an image at larger size from the gallery (e.g., by tapping/clicking an image to open a preview overlay/dialog) with a clear way to close and return to the grid.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add an images section to the app and include the provided images

Add the 8 user-uploaded images as static frontend assets and reference them by filename in the UI: IMG_20260208_024943140-1.jpg, IMG_20260208_024948850.jpg, IMG_20260208_024928950.jpg, IMG_20260208_024935455.jpg, IMG_20260208_024928950-1.jpg, IMG_20260208_024948850-1.jpg, IMG_20260208_024943140-2.jpg, IMG_20260208_024935455-1.jpg.

projectName: Add an in-app image gallery section using the 8 uploaded photos
